Instruction: Mix together flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar in a bowl. In another bowl, beat eggs with buttermilk. Combine the egg mixture with the dry ingredients and stir in raisins.
Knead the dough lightly and shape it into a round loaf. Place the dough in a springform pan that has been lightly greased. Top with caraway seeds, if desired.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 1 hour or until the bottom of the loaf sounds hollow when tapped.
